titles.title: What Is This That Keeps My Feet A-walking?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What is this that keeps my feet a-walking?
What is this that keeps my hands a-clapping?
What is this that keeps my mouth a praising?
It is the power of an endless life.
Chorus:
An endless life, an endless life,
A life with no division or strife.
Keeps my feet a-walking, hands a-clapping, mouth a-praising.
It is the power of an endless life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Have you ever wondered where you came from,
That you might turn around and find your way back?
If you listen the Spirit will tell you...
After the order of Melchisedec.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Having neither beginning nor ending,
Having neither father nor mother,
But a priest that abideth forever
After the order of Melchisedec.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Qué mantiene mis pies caminando?
Qué mantiene mis manos palmeando?
Qué mantiene mi boca alabando?
Es el poder de una vida sin fin.
/Una vida sin fin/ (2)
División y contienda no hay
Me mantiene caminando, palmeando y alabando
Es el poder de una vida sin fin.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
No teniendo, ni padre, ni madre
No teniendo principio, ni fin
Sino un Sacerdocio que permanece para siempre
Según el orden de Melquisedec.
